title: Vancouver Harbourfront Stay with Rooftop Pool, Onsite Spa & Daily CA$50 Dining Credit
description:
Soaring high above the Vancouver Waterfront with spectacular views over the city skyline, harbour and coastal mountains, this landmark hotel is your gateway to British Columbia's beauty. Its location on Canada Place puts you within easy reach of the cruise terminal, markets and heritage sites of the historic harbourfront.

Onsite, you will find three renowned dining venues, including Coal Harbour Bar with fresh seafood and AAA Canadian Steak, the Oceans 999 Restaurant offering Saturday night jazz and the award-winning Five Sails fine diner boasting exquisite West Coast fare and views over the Canada Place sails. For pure relaxation, head to Utopia Spa for rejuvenating treatments or visit the rooftop for cocktails by the heated saltwater pool.
offer_address: Suite 300-999 Canada Place, Vancouver, British Columbia V6C 3B5, Canada

title: Five-Star Vancouver Fairmont Elegance with Pool and Skyline Views in the Heart of Downtown
description:
Experience the grandeur of Fairmont Hotel Vancouver, majestically standing in the heart of the city's bustling shopping and cultural district. Known as the 'Castle in the City', this hotel opened in 1939 and is where timeless elegance meets modern luxury. Relax in the hotel's state-of-the-art health club before retreating to the acclaimed Notch8 Restaurant & Bar for a sumptuous meal.

Beyond the hotel explore the nearby Vancouver Art Gallery or shop at the high-end boutiques on Robson Street and refuel at the Granville Island Public Market, where a diverse assortment of fresh, local produce awaits. Your central launchpad is a short stroll from the stunning Stanley Park, where you can enjoy a leisurely walk along the Vancouver Seawall or visit the Vancouver Aquarium.
offer_address: 900 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, British Columbia V6C 2W6, Canada

title: Vancouver Waterfront City Break near Canada Place with Onsite Restaurant & Rooftop Pool
description:
Rising gracefully along Vancouverâ€™s waterfront, this sophisticated Fairmont retreat blends timeless architecture with modern West Coast luxury. Inside, serene spaces invite relaxation - from the sparkling year-round heated rooftop pool to the 24-hour fitness centre that offers panoramic views of Stanley Park and the North Shore Mountains, enhancing every workout.

Culinary delights await at ARC Restaurant + Bar, where rooftop-harvested honey and herbs infuse seasonal dishes and cocktails. Just steps away, explore the iconic Seawall, historic Gastown and the vibrant shops of Robson Street. Whether cycling through Stanley Park or savouring local flavours, this retreat offers a perfect balance of relaxation and adventure in the heart of Vancouver.
offer_address: 900 Canada Pl, Vancouver, British Columbia, V6C 3L5, Canada

title: Five-Star Harbourfront Vancouver Stay with Award-Winning Cocktail Bar & World-Class Spa
description:
Experience the height of Vancouver's luxury at this elegant retreat,  located in the city's vibrant downtown and offering breathtaking views of the mountains and harbour. Fairmont Pacific Rim is all about new experiences: savour fresh Pacific Northwest cuisine at Botanist, or enjoy a handcrafted cocktail at the Lobby Lounge and RawBar, known for sushi and live music.

Venture out to explore the nearby historic Gastown, with its cobbled streets and unique boutiques, or take a stroll along the picturesque Stanley Park seawall. For art enthusiasts, the Vancouver Art Gallery is just a short walk away. After a day of exploring, rejuvenate at the tranquil Fairmont Spa, or take a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool with panoramic city views.
offer_address: 1038 Canada Pl, Vancouver, British Columbia, V6C 0B9, Canada

title: Fairmont Vancouver Airport Stay Located Within International Terminal with Onsite Restaurants
description:
Experience the best of Vancouver with a luxurious Fairmont stay at the only hotel in Vancouver International Airport. Perfectly positioned for those in transit or looking to explore the city, this hotel offers easy access to the vibrant downtown area, the stunning Stanley Park, and the historic Gastown district.

After a day of exploring, retreat to the hotel's award-winning Globe@YVR Restaurant, which celebrates flavours of the Pacific Northwest. For those seeking relaxation, the onsite Health Club and Spa offers a range of rejuvenating treatments including saunas and a childrens pool. To end your day, retreat to your soundproofed room or suite, where floor-to-ceiling windows offer breathtaking views of the runway and Vancouver's dramatic mountainscape.
offer_address: Vancouver International Airport, 3111 Grant McConachie Wy, Richmond, Vancouver, British Columbia, V7B 0A6, Canada

title: Vancouver Five-Star Shangri-La Luxury in the Heart of Downtown
description: Occupying 15 floors of the tallest building in Downtown Vancouver, close to high-end shopping and a wide range of restaurants, Shangri-La Vancouver offers an opulent city sanctuary inspired by traditional Asian influences. Ranked within the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor, Shangri-La Vancouver features outstanding service and five-star facilities. Go beyond the marble-clad lobby and discover a state-of-the-art fitness centre, outdoor pool, the luxurious Chi, The Spa, celebrated Italian fare at Carlino restaurant and freshly squeezed juices at Ginger Juice Bar.
offer_address: 1128 W Georgia St, Vancouver, BC V6E 0A8, Canada

title: Boutique Vancouver Escape in the Heart of Yaletown Neighbourhood
description: Escape to this oceanside metropolis with a stay at OPUS Vancouver, a tastefully funky hotel in the heart of the pumping Yaletown neighbourhood. Stylishly designed, this boutique hotel offers a calming retreat and authentic Vancouver experience. Explore the neighbourhood like a local with the hotel's electric bikes, then finish your day by enjoying a cocktail at The Spritz bar or grabbing a bite to eat from Capo restaurant for the quintessential pizzeria dining experience.
offer_address: 322 Davie St, Vancouver, BC V6B 5Z6, Canada
